Actions.Name: Chaos Shard
Actions.Hit: Character is inflicted with all four blights.
Actions.Miss: Character is inflicted with two blights of this wright's choice.
Actions.Effects: If already blighted, character takes 2 piercing damage once, then is shoved 1 space, once, for every blight they are inflicted with. The shoves can be in different directions.

Actions.Name: Chaos Rift
Actions.Description: Create a pit in free space in range 3. The pit is also dangerous terrain.

Actions.Name: Chaos Storm
Actions.Description: Remove all characters in the area from the battlefield, then place them in any space within range 3 of their original location.
